      • requestServiceTicketForApp

        public java.util.Map<KerberosAuthenticationAPIImpl.ServiceTicketResponseAttributes,java.lang.String> requestServiceTicketForApp(java.lang.String url,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String encAppTGTPacket,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String sessionKey)
                                                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                RestClientException
        Specified by:
        requestServiceTicketForApp in interface IKerberosServiceTicketRequestAPI
        encAppTGTPacket - String TGT Packet
        serviceName - String Service UID (as registered in the Directory) for which the ServiceTicket has to be retrieved
        sessionKey - String Kerberos Session ID generated after Kerberos Authentication
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case there are some errors encountered while retrieving information
        RestClientException - If the status of the response is not 200. The server side error message and error response code can be accessed using getMessage and getErrorCode methods respectively
